Articles.Content:
I had downloaded B9 Aerospace and loaded up KSP to test it out.

I got to the loading screen with the hints and as the game finished loading, it just shut down.

Post your Unity player.log. It is much easier to find the problem with system information. Other than that, try installing ActiveTextureManagement.

Alternatively, you can uninstall B9. It is a massive pack that uses up a ton of RAM.
